item.title: Eighteen injured in Hamburg knife attack as woman arrested
item.description: A 39-year-old woman is understood to have acted alone with no "political motive", German police say.

item.title: EU calls for 'respect' after Trump threatens 50% tariffs
item.description: Trade chief Maros Sefcovic said the EU is "ready to defend" its interests after Trump threatened 50% tariffs on the bloc.

item.title: San Diego airport experienced glitches before fatal plane crash
item.description: All six on the plane are believed to be dead, including a former drummer for The Devil Wears Prada and a high-profile music agent.

item.title: King's big moment in Canada after Trump row
item.description: What's likely to be the message when King Charles makes a speech in Canada?

item.title: Can Donald Trump build the 'Golden Dome' over the US?
item.description: Experts believe that it will take decades and hundreds of billions of dollars to build the 'Golden Dome'.
